oai_dc:dc.dc:title: History of Banking in Chattanooga
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Hamilton National Bank of Chattanooga
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A History of Banking in Chattanooga (Revised). Hamilton National Bank. Chattanooga, Tennessee. Member-Federal Reserve System. Member- Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation. Published by The Hamilton National Bank of Chattanooga 1925, Revised 1949.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Banks; Banking industry; History;
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Loaned for scanning from a private collection. The McClung Historical Collection does not own the original.
